details.description:
Tharindi manages technical partnerships at Thomson Reuters Labs, collaborating with startups, universities and other organisations on exploring and building innovative data science solutions. Prior to joining the Labs, Tharindi worked on technology strategy and governance.

She first joined Thomson Reuters in 2014, and has since been collaborating with the Open Data Institute on a number of thought leadership white papers focused on data techniques that benefit the wider community.

At the summit, Tharindi will speaking about our recent paper on making data shareable.

She has a PhD and MRes in Mathematical Modelling from University College London.
